survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered recruitment tools to understand their satisfaction levels, pain points, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered recruitment tools in your hiring process?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered recruitment tools in your hiring process?

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered recruitment tools do you currently use?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with a checkbox option for 'Other' to capture all tools used.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered recruitment tools do you currently use?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of candidate matching provided by AI-powered recruitment tools?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of candidate matching provided by AI-powered recruitment tools?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using AI-powered recruitment tools?
answer_options: Lack of transparency in AI decisions
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant challenges.
